document.full_text: tokyo electric power co inc (tepco)  will likely report a net loss of more than 1 trillion yen ($12.46 billion) for the last fiscal, hurt by charges resulting from the accident at its fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant in march, business daily nikkei reported.
document.title: tepco may report net loss of $12.46 billion for 2010: report
lines_and_colors: tokyo electric power co inc (tepco)  will likely report a net loss of more than 1 trillion yen ($12.46 billion) for the last fiscal, hurt by charges resulting from the accident at its fukushima daiichi nuclear power plant in march, business daily nikkei reported.
